sqlMap.select:
SELECT A.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, S.* FROM ( SELECT P2MGR.SF_PRT_AT_NM@YGPA_P2MGR(#sAppPrtAtCode#) APP_PRT_AT_NM , P2MGR.SF_PRT_AT_NM@YGPA_P2MGR(#sPrtAtCode#) PRT_AT_NM , B.PRT_AT_KOR_NM , A.APP_PRT_AT_CODE , A.PRT_AT_CODE , A.CMPL_YR , A.APP_AGENT_CODE AS SCTMC , P2MGR.SF_AGENT_NM@YGPA_P2MGR(#sAppAgentCode#) AGENT_NM1 , P2MGR.SF_AGENT_NM@YGPA_P2MGR(APP_AGENT_CODE) AGENT_NM2 , SUBSTR(A.APP_AGENT_CODE,1,2)||'-'||SUBSTR(A.APP_AGENT_CODE,3,1)||'-'||SUBSTR(A.APP_AGENT_CODE,4,4) AGENT_CODE1 , A.USE_NO , A.FEE_TP , C.FEE_TP_KOR_NM , A.FISCAL_YR||'-'||A.SOC_NO FISCAL_SOC_NO , P2MGR.SF_VSSL_CALL_LETTER@YGPA_P2MGR (A.VSSL_KEY) CALL_LETTER , P2MGR.SF_VSSL_NM@YGPA_P2MGR(A.VSSL_KEY) D_VSSL_KOR_NM , A.YR||'-'||A.SER_NO AS YICN , TO_CHAR(A.BILL_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') BILL_DT , A.DC_CODE , A.CONST_NO , A.EXMP_AGENT_CODE , DECODE(A.DC_RATE_NM,'1','20%','2','50%','3','80%','5','15%','9','100%') AS RATE , DECODE(A.IN_OUT,'1','외입','2','외출','3','내입','4','내출') AS IXTN , A.YR , A.SER_NO , A.STANDARD_FEE , DECODE(JINGSUJA,'PAT',0,A.EXMP_AMNT ) AS EXMP_AMNT , DECODE(JINGSUJA,'PAT',A.EXMP_AMNT,0 ) AS EXMP_AMNT_PA , (A.EXMP_AMNT+0 /*EXMP_AMNT_PA*/) SUM_AMNT , A.REAL_TN , TO_CHAR(A.IO_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') IO_DT , SUBSTRB(A.EXMP_AGENT_CODE,1,2)||'-'||SUBSTRB(A.EXMP_AGENT_CODE,3,1)||'-'||SUBSTRB(A.EXMP_AGENT_CODE,4,4) AS MCTMC , P2MGR.SF_AGENT_NM@YGPA_P2MGR(A.EXMP_AGENT_CODE) AGENT_NM3 , A.REMARK , B.PRT_KOR_NM , F. SOC_CNST_NM , F.TOTAL_AMNT , P2MGR.SF_ARVL_DT_REV@YGPA_P2MGR(A.APP_PRT_AT_CODE, A.VSSL_KEY, A.YR, A.SER_NO ) ARVL_DT , P2MGR.SF_DEP_DT_REV@YGPA_P2MGR(A.APP_PRT_AT_CODE, A.VSSL_KEY, A.YR, A.SER_NO ) DEP_DT
FROM
P2MGR.SOC_EXMP_F@YGPA_P2MGR A , P2MGR.PRT_AT_CODE_F@YGPA_P2MGR B , PAYEOSU.FEE_TP_F C , P2MGR.VSSL_F@YGPA_P2MGR D , P2MGR.SOC_AGENT_F@YGPA_P2MGR F
WHERE
A.APP_PRT_AT_CODE = #sAppPrtAtCode# AND A.PRT_AT_CODE = #sPrtAtCode# AND A.CMPL_YR = #sCmplYr# AND A.CONST_NO = #sConstNo# AND A.APP_AGENT_CODE = #sAppAgentCode# AND A.USE_NO = #sUseNo# AND A.FEE_TP LIKE #sFeeTp# || '%' AND ((A.BILL_DT >= TO_DATE(#sDtFr#,'YYYY-MM-DD') AND A.BILL_DT < TO_DATE(#sDtTo#,'YYYY-MM-DD') + 1) OR (A.IO_DT >= TO_DATE(#sIoDt#,'YYYY-MM-DD') AND A.IO_DT < TO_DATE(#sIoDt2#,'YYYY-MM-DD') + 1)) AND (A.APP_PRT_AT_CODE = B.PRT_AT_CODE(+)) AND (A.APP_PRT_AT_CODE = C.PRT_AT_CODE(+) AND A.FEE_TP = C.FEE_TP(+)) AND (A.VSSL_KEY = D.VSSL_KEY(+)) AND A.PRT_AT_CODE = F.PRT_AT_CODE AND A.CONST_NO = F.CONST_NO AND A.CMPL_YR = F.CMPL_YR
ORDER BY A.IO_DT, A.BILL_DT, A.APP_PRT_AT_CODE, A.CALL_LETTER, A.YR, A.SER_NO, A.FISCAL_YR, A.SOC_NO
) S ) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #recordCountPerPage# and RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) AS TOTAL_CNT , NVL(SUM(DECODE(JINGSUJA,'PAT',0,A.EXMP_AMNT )),0) AS SUM_EXMP_AMNT , NVL(SUM(DECODE(JINGSUJA,'PAT',A.EXMP_AMNT,0 )),0) AS SUM_EXMP_AMNT_PA , NVL(SUM(DECODE(JINGSUJA,'PAT',0,A.EXMP_AMNT ) + DECODE(JINGSUJA,'PAT',A.EXMP_AMNT,0 )),0) AS SUM_AMNT FROM
P2MGR.SOC_EXMP_F@YGPA_P2MGR A , P2MGR.PRT_AT_CODE_F@YGPA_P2MGR B , PAYEOSU.FEE_TP_F C , P2MGR.VSSL_F@YGPA_P2MGR D , P2MGR.SOC_AGENT_F@YGPA_P2MGR F
WHERE
A.APP_PRT_AT_CODE = #sAppPrtAtCode# AND A.PRT_AT_CODE = #sPrtAtCode# AND A.CMPL_YR = #sCmplYr# AND A.CONST_NO = #sConstNo# AND A.APP_AGENT_CODE = #sAppAgentCode# AND A.USE_NO = #sUseNo# AND A.FEE_TP LIKE #sFeeTp# || '%' AND ((A.BILL_DT >= TO_DATE(#sDtFr#,'YYYY-MM-DD') AND A.BILL_DT < TO_DATE(#sDtTo#,'YYYY-MM-DD') + 1) OR (A.IO_DT >= TO_DATE(#sIoDt#,'YYYY-MM-DD') AND A.IO_DT < TO_DATE(#sIoDt2#,'YYYY-MM-DD') + 1)) AND (A.APP_PRT_AT_CODE = B.PRT_AT_CODE(+)) AND (A.APP_PRT_AT_CODE = C.PRT_AT_CODE(+) AND A.FEE_TP = C.FEE_TP(+)) AND (A.VSSL_KEY = D.VSSL_KEY(+)) AND A.PRT_AT_CODE = F.PRT_AT_CODE AND A.CONST_NO = F.CONST_NO AND A.CMPL_YR = F.CMPL_YR
